overview: By chance, Kui Kui picked up a wounded goat. The kind Kui Kui took the goat home and healed its injury. In order to find the owner of the goat, Kui Kui wrote a claim notice, but he didn't know that the notice was blown away by the strong wind within a few days after it was posted, so Kui Kui wrote another one, this time, he posted the notice on his mother on the tractor.
title: The Goat Returns Home
